title: Gsoc Acceptance
content:
--- title: "GSoC Acceptance" kind: article created_at: 2014-05-01 03:40:25 UTC author: Max (Dockerization) image: https://avatars3.githubusercontent.com/u/4483139?s=50 categories: GSoC-2014 tags: "news dockerization" layout: post ---

I was accepted to GSoC 2014!!

So my proposal was accepted by TimVideos! I found out about a week ago that starting May 19th I'll be starting and fulfilling the proposal.

I'm very excited about this and can't wait to begin work!

Originally posted on Max Stritzinger
